937:2: athaivamukto'pi sa tena bhikṣuṇā jagāma naivopaśamaṃ priyāṃ prati|
937:3: tathā hi tāmeva tadā sa cintayan na tasya śuśrāva visaṃjñavad vacaḥ||1||
937:4: yathā hi vaidyasya cikīrṣataḥ śivaṃ vaco na gṛṇhāti mumūrṣurāturaḥ|
937:5: tathaiva matto balarūpayauvanairhitaṃ na jagrāha sa tasya tadvacaḥ||2||
937:6: na cātra citraṃ yadi rāgapāpmanā mano'bhibhūyeta tamovṛtātmanaḥ|
937:7: narasya pāpmā hi tadā nivartate yadā bhavatyantagataṃ tamastanu||3||
937:8: tatastathākṣiptamavekṣya taṃ tadā balena rūpeṇa ca yauvanena ca|
937:9: gṛhaprayāṇaṃ prati ca vyavasthitaṃ śaśāsa nandaṃ śramaṇaḥ sa śāntaye||4||
937:10: balaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca navaṃ ca yauvanaṃ tathāvagacchāmi yathāvagacchasi|
937:11: ahaṃ tvidaṃ te trayamavyavasthitaṃ yathāvabuddhye na tathāvabudhyase||5||
937:13: na vetsi dehaṃ jalaphenadurbalaṃ balasthatāmātmani yena manyase||6||
937:17: jalaṃ śucau māsa ivārkaraśmibhiḥ kṣayaṃ vrajan kiṃ baladṛpta manyase||8||
937:20: yathā ghaṭaṃ mṛnmayamāmamāśrito narastitīrṣet kṣubhitaṃ mahārṇavam|
937:22: śarīramāmādapi mṛnmayād ghaṭādidaṃ tu niḥsāratamaṃ mataṃ mama|
937:23: ciraṃ hi tiṣṭhed vidhivad dhṛto ghaṭaḥ samucchrayo'yaṃ sudhṛto'pi bhidyate||11||
937:24: yadāmbubhūvāyvanalāśca dhātavaḥ sadā viruddhā viṣamā ivoragāḥ|
937:25: bhavantyanarthāya śarīramāśritāḥ kathaṃ balaṃ rogavidho vyavasyasi||12||
937:26: prayānti mantraiḥ praśamaṃ bhujaṅgamā na mantrasādhyastu bhavanti dhātavaḥ|
937:27: kvacicca kaṃcicca daśanti pannagāḥ sadā ca sarvaṃ ca tudanti dhātavaḥ||13||
937:29: na marṣayatyekamapi vyatikramaṃ yato mahāśīviṣavat prakupyati||14||
937:30: yadā himārto jvalanaṃ niṣevate himaṃ nidādhābhihato'bhikāṅkṣati|
937:31: kṣudhānvito'nnaṃ salilaṃ tṛṣānvito balaṃ kutaḥ kiṃ ca kathaṃ ca kasya ca||15||
937:35: cakarta bāhūn yudhi yasya bhārgavaḥ mahānti śrṛṅgāṇyaśanirgiretiva||17||
937:36: kva tad valaṃ kaṃsavikarṣiṇo haresturaṅgarājasya puṭāvabhedinaḥ|
937:37: yamekabāṇena nijaghnivān jarāḥ kramāgatā rūpamivottamaṃ jarā||18||
937:38: diteḥ sutasyāmararoṣakāriṇaścamūrucervā namuceḥ kva tad balam|
937:39: yamāhave kruddhamivāntakaṃ sthitaṃ jaghāna phenāvayavena vāsavaḥ||19||
937:40: balaṃ kurūṇāṃ kva ca tattadābhavad yudhi jvalitvā tarasaujasā ca ye|
937:41: samitsamiddhā jvalanā ivādhvare hatāsavo bhasmani paryavasthitāḥ||20||
937:44: balaṃ mahad yadi vā na manyase kuruṣva yuddhaṃ saha tāvadindriyaiḥ|
937:45: jayaśca te'trāsti mahacca te balaṃ parājayaśced vitathaṃ ca te balam||22||
937:46: tathā hi vīrāḥ puruṣā na te matā jayanti ye sāśvarathadvipānarīn
937:47: yathā matā vīratarā manīṣiṇo jayanti lolāni ṣaḍindriyāṇi ye||23||
937:48: ahaṃ vapuṣmāniti yacca manyase vicakṣaṇaṃ naitadidaṃ ca gṛhyatām|
937:49: kva tadvapuḥ sā ca vapuṣmatī tanurgadasya śāmbasya ca sāraṇasya ca||24||
937:50: yathā mayūraścalacitracandrako bibharti rūpaṃ guṇavat svabhāvataḥ|
937:51: śarīrasaṃskāraguṇādṛte tathā bibharti rūpaṃ yadi rūpavānasi||25||
937:52: yadi pratīpaṃ vṛṇuyānna vāsasā na śaucakāle yadi saṃspṛśedapaḥ|
937:53: mṛjāviśeṣaṃ yadi nādadīta vā vapurvapuṣman vada kīdṛśaṃ bhavet||26||
937:54: navaṃ vayaścātmagataṃ niśāmya yadgṛ honmukhaṃ te viṣayāptaye manaḥ|
937:55: niyaccha tacchailanadīrayopamaṃ drutaṃ hi gacchatyanivarti yauvanam||27||
937:56: ṛturvyatītaḥ parivartate punaḥ kṣayaṃ prayātaḥ punareti candramāḥ|
937:57: gataṃ gataṃ naiva tu saṃnivartate jalaṃ nadīnāṃ ca nṛṇāṃ ca yauvanam||28||
937:59: yadā mukhaṃ drakṣyasi jarjaraṃ tadā jarābhibhūto vimado bhaviṣyasi||29||
937:60: niṣevya pānaṃ madanīyamuttamaṃ niśāvivāseṣu cirād vimādyati|
937:61: narastu matto balarūpayouvanairna kaścidaprāpya jarāṃ vimādyati||30||
937:64: yathā hi nṛbhyāṃ karapatramīritaṃ samucchritaṃ dāru bhinattyanekadhā|
937:66: smṛteḥ pramoṣo vapuṣaḥ parābhavo rateḥ kṣayo vācchruticakṣuṣāṃ grahaḥ|
937:67: śramasya yonirbalavīryayorvadho jarāsamo nāsti śarīriṇāṃ ripuḥ||33||
937:68: idaṃ viditvā nidhanasya daiśikaṃ jarābhidhānaṃ jagato mahabhdayam|
937:69: ahaṃ vapuṣmān balavān yuveti vā na mānamāroḍhumanāryamarhasi||34||
937:70: ahaṃ mametyeva ca raktacetasāṃ śarīrasaṃjñā tava yaḥ kalau grahaḥ|
937:71: tamutsṛjaivaṃ yadi śāmyatā bhaved bhayaṃ hyahaṃ ceti mameti cārchati||35||
937:72: yadā śarīre na vaśo'sti kasyacinnirasyamāne vividhairupaplavaiḥ|
937:73: kathaṃ kṣamaṃ vettumahaṃ mameti vā śarīrasaṃjñaṃ gṛhamāpadāmidam||36||
937:74: sapannage yaḥ kugṛhe sadāśucau rameta nityaṃ pratisaṃskṛte'bale|
937:75: sa duṣṭadhātāvaśucau calācale rameta kāye viparītadarśanaḥ||37||
937:76: yathā prajābhyaḥ kunṛpo balād balīn haratyaśeṣaṃ ca na cābhirakṣati|
937:77: tathaiva kāyo vasanādisādhanaṃ haratyaśeṣaṃ ca na cānuvartate||38||
937:78: yathā prarohanti tṛṇānyayatnataḥ kṣitau prayatnāt tu bhavanti śālayaḥ|
937:79: tathaiva duḥkhāni bhavantyayatnataḥ sukhāni yatnena bhavanti vā na vā||39||
937:80: śarīramārtaṃ parikarṣataścalaṃ na cāsti kiñcit paramārthataḥ sukham|
937:81: sukhaṃ hi duḥkhapratikārasevayā sthite ca duḥkhe tanuni vyavasyati||40||
937:83: tathānapekṣyātmani duḥkhamāgataṃ na vidyate kiñcana kasyacit sukhaṃ||41||
937:86: na kāmabhogā hi bhavanti tṛptaye havīṃṣi dīptasya vibhāvasoriva|
937:87: yathā yathā kāmasukheṣu vartate tathā tathecchā viṣayeṣu varddhate||43||
937:88: yathā ca kuṣṭhavyasanena duḥkhitaḥ pratāpanānnaiva śamaṃ nigacchati|
937:90: yathā hi bhaiṣajyasukhābhikāṅkṣayā bhajeta rogānna bhajeta tatkṣamam|
937:91: tathā śarīre bahuduḥkhabhājane rameta mohād viṣayābhikāṅkṣayā||45||
937:92: anarthakāmaḥ puruṣasya yo janaḥ sa tasya śatruḥ kila tena karmaṇā|
937:93: anarthamūlā viṣayāśca kevalā nanu praheyā viṣamā yathārayaḥ||46||
937:94: ihaiva bhūtvā ripavo vadhātmakāḥ prayānti kāle puruṣasya mitratāṃ|
937:95: paratra caiveha ca duḥkhahetavo bhavanti kāmā na tu kasyacicchivāḥ||47||
937:96: yathopayuktaṃ rasavarṇagandhavad vadhāya kimpākaphalaṃ na puṣṭaye|
937:97: niṣevyamāṇā viṣayāścalātmano bhavantyanarthāya tathā na bhūtaye||48||
937:99: juṣasva me sajjanasaṃmataṃ mataṃ pracakṣva vā niścayamud giran giram||49||
937:100: iti hitamapi bahvapīdamuktaḥ śrutamahatā śramaṇena tena nandaḥ|
937:101: na dhṛtimupayayau na śarma lebhe dvirada ivātimado madāndhacetāḥ||50||
937:106: saundarananda mahākāvye “abhimāna-nindā“ nāma navama sarga samāpta|
